I wish to petition the Leader of the House of Commons to allow MP's to dress casually on Fridays.
I think this may help lower MP's stress levels with all they have had to face recently ie, expense scandles, NOTW phone hacking, pointless riots.
I think they are all doing a sterling job (both side of the house) and they should be cut a little slack. Especially with having to cut their holidays short for emergency sessions.
